title: Brainstorm Assistant
body: Use this prompt to generate five new ideas for [topic] tailored to [audience].

title: Design Sprint
summary: Five-day process for solving problems and testing ideas.
body: Day1: Understand, Day2: Sketch, Day3: Decide, Day4: Prototype, Day5: Test.

title: Generative Models
summary: Key concepts from a lecture on generative models.
body: Generative models learn the distribution of data and can produce new samples. Common types include GANs and VAEs.
